column2: Key responsibilities: 1. Colleague Communications Strategic planning: Support the Colleague Communications Lead on developing and executing the company India communications and engagement strategy, leveraging all available communication channels and tools. Understand the comprehensive annual colleague engagement and communication plan with short, mid and long-term initiatives and advise on the appropriate execution strategy. Strategic planning for creation, editing, designing, and publishing all colleague communications/ publications including communication emails, posters, AVs, newsletters, townhalls, etc. 2. On-ground event execution: Facilitate the end-to-end execution plan for colleague communication events including vendor sourcing, communicating event requirements, price negotiations, coordinating the event, backstage event management and coordinating payments to vendors. Co-ordinate for site-specific global events like safety week, milestone celebrations, and other related activities. Closely work with the teams from different BUs to support collaterals required for colleague awareness initiatives (Breast Cancer Week, World Immunization Week, Womens Day etc.), business events like Plan of Action Meetings (POAs) or colleague engagement teams (Sports Committee, Womens Group etc). Ensure the seamless execution of our annual corporate gifting to employees through appropriate selection of items, price negotiations, sampling, and coordination with delivery partners. 3. Vendor Management and Administrative Support Engage in a robust search for quality vendors for our events including production agencies, designing agencies and corporate gifting agencies etc. Undertake the process of bringing vendors into the company network ensuring complete adherence to legal & compliance processes/requirements. Coordinate all payments to vendors by raising POs and ensuring invoices are sent to the payments team in a timely manner. Maintain the CCE expense records and ensure periodic cascade and alignment with internal stakeholders. Capacity: Full time Duration: 12 months.

column2: We are seeking a skilled Digital Experience Consultant with exposure to technical project management     This position requires a combination of expertise in digital experience design, user-centric approach, and hands-on experience in technical project management     The successful candidate will play a key role in shaping digital experiences while ensuring successful project delivery through effective project management practices         Key Responsibilities:       ?     1. Digital Experience Consulting:     2. Technical Project Management:     3. Client Engagement and Relationship Management:     4. Technology Integration and Implementation Support:     5. Training Program Development:       Collaborate with clients to understand their business objectives, target audience, and digital needs.     Develop and implement comprehensive digital strategies aligned with business goals, leveraging technology to enhance user experiences.     Conduct user research, persona development, and journey mapping to inform digital strategy recommendations.     Lead the design process to create intuitive and user-friendly digital interfaces for websites, mobile apps, and other digital platforms.     Assist in project planning, execution, and monitoring, ensuring projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.     Support CMS Web Application project teams in defining project objectives, deliverables, and success criteria.     Coordinate cross-functional teams, including designers, developers, and content creators, to ensure alignment and collaboration.     Monitor project progress, identify risks and issues, and support mitigation efforts to ensure project success.     Serve as a point of contact for clients, maintaining strong relationships and communication throughout the project lifecycle.     Understand client requirements, address concerns, and manage expectations to ensure client satisfaction.     Provide strategic guidance and thought leadership to clients, helping them achieve their digital objectives.     Assist in evaluating digital technologies, platforms, and tools to support digital initiatives.     Support the implementation and integration of digital solutions, ensuring alignment with technical requirements.     Collaborate with IT teams and developers to facilitate seamless integration and alignment with project objectives.     Collaborate with subject matter experts (SMEs) and training stakeholders to identify training needs and objectives.     Design and develop technical training programs, courses, and materials based on identified needs and learning objectives.     Incorporate instructional design principles, and best practices into training content development.     Collect feedback from training participants, trainers, and stakeholders to evaluate training effectiveness and identify areas for improvement.     Recommend and implement enhancements to training programs, content, and delivery methods based on evaluation results and industry best practices.         Requirements:       ?     1. MCA /B-Tech/MBA with 4+ years of experience in software development.     2. At least 2+ years of experience working as a CMS Consultant or similar role, with a focus on content management systems and digital content strategies.     3. Strong understanding of various CMS platforms, such as AEM, Drupal, etc     4. Experience in requirements gathering, system configuration, and user training for CMS implementations.     5. Good understanding of web technologies.     6. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with clients, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams.     7. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.     8. Ability to prioritize tasks, meets deadlines, and manages multiple projects simultaneously
